com.justyna.stachera.householdexpenses.controller

Class SBEditCapitalisationsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.justyna.stachera.householdexpenses.controller.SBEditCapitalisationsController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SBWebsitesAndMessages

    @Controller
public class SBEditCapitalisationsController
extends java.lang.Object
implements SBWebsitesAndMessages
    Version:
    2.0

    User: jstachera

    Date: 02.01.2018

    Controller class with methods that support '/edit/capitalisations/**' links directly.

    Author:
    Justyna Stachera.

      • SBEditCapitalisationsController

        @Autowired
public SBEditCapitalisationsController(SBCapitalisationDao capitalisationDao,
                                                   SBCapitalisationCustomDao capitalisationCustomDao,
                                                   SBKindOfLoanDao kindOfLoanDao,
                                                   SBLoanDao loanDao,
                                                   SBUserDao userDao,
                                                   SBCapitalisationValidator capitalisationValidator)
        An argument constructor autowired interfaces extending JpaRepository and Validator objects.
        Parameters:
        capitalisationDao - It provides methods related with 'sbcapitalisation' table from database.
        capitalisationCustomDao - It provides extra methods related with 'sbcapitalisation' table from database.
        kindOfLoanDao - It provides methods related with 'sbkind_of_loan' table from database.
        loanDao - It provides methods related with 'sbloan' table from database.
        userDao - It provides methods related with 'sbuser' table from database.
        capitalisationValidator - It validates SBCapitalisation object fields.
